title: Fluffy Pancakes with Berry Compote
shortDescription: Enjoy a delicious morning with these light and fluffy pancakes topped with a vibrant berry compote.

instructions.instruction: In a mixing bowl, combine 250 grams of all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons of sugar, 2 teaspoons of baking powder, and a pinch of salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together 2 large eggs, 375 milliliters of milk, and 60 milliliters of melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and gently mix until just combined. Be careful not to overmix; lumps are okay.
Preheat a griddle or non-stick skillet over medium heat. Lightly grease with butter or cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) of batter onto the griddle for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden brown.
Repeat until all the batter is used, keeping cooked pancakes warm in a low-temperature oven.
In a saucepan, combine 200 grams of mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) with 60 grams of sugar and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice.
Simmer over medium heat until the berries break down and the mixture thickens slightly, about 10 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Remove from heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
Stack the fluffy pancakes on a plate and generously spoon the warm berry compote over the top.
Optional: Drizzle with maple syrup and garnish with fresh mint leaves for an extra burst of flavor.
Serve immediately and savor the deliciousness of your homemade pancakes with berry compote.

body: Start your day on a delicious note with these Fluffy Pancakes topped with a vibrant and sweet berry compote. The light and airy texture of the pancakes combined with the burst of berry flavors make this breakfast a treat for your taste buds. Whip up this simple and delightful recipe for a memorable morning feast!
author: ChatGPT
